snippet.title: Surviving Mars Space Race Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The race to stake your place in space begins today! 
https://pdxint.at/2Pon1PE
Surviving Mars: Space Race is blasting off with a focus on mission sponsors and rival colonies. Pitting Earth’s greatest countries and most powerful companies against each other.

You must choose your sponsor wisely as each has its own benefits and objectives, and other colonies are competing for the limited resources on the red planet.

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
